item.title: Product
item.description: The primary erg product is an engagement survey. We are also working on an package to capture online survey responses. The engagement survey has norms representing most major U.S. metropolitan areas as well as four industrial groups {"x":{"url":"index_files/figure-html//widgets/widget_Norms.html","options":{"xdomain":"*","allowfullscreen":false,"lazyload":false}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Figure 1: Engagement survey normative information â€¦long term we will help organizations transition to full -enabled workflows Testing cross-referencing here (see Figure 1)
